file_insights.changes_summary: Corrected Tailwind CSS color reference for dark mode ring offset

patterns_discovered: Tailwind CSS dark mode configuration validation
UI component styling with focus and hover states
gotchas_discovered: Incorrect color reference in Tailwind utility classes can break styling
Typo in color class name ('dark-surface-bg' vs 'dark-surface')
recommendations: Validate Tailwind color configuration before deployment
Implement automated checks for utility class consistency
Review dark mode styling across components for similar issues
